translation.title: Five Discourses on Not Differentiating Form, Etc.

next.name: Five Discourses on Not Examining Form, Etc.

previous.name: Five Discourses on Not Detecting Form, Etc.

segments.en: 36–40. Five Discourses on Not Differentiating Form, Etc.

segments.pli: “Rūpe kho, vaccha, appaccupalakkhaṇā … pe … viññāṇe kho, vaccha, appaccupalakkhaṇā … pe ….
segments.en: “Vaccha, it is because of not differentiating form …”

suttaplex.blurb: The wanderer Vacchagotta asks the Buddha why the various speculative views come to be. The Buddha replies that it is because of not differntiating the five aggregates.
suttaplex.translated_title: Five Discourses on Not Differentiating Form, Etc.
